data.title: Excellent coffee!
data.text: I am so happy with Port City Java!! My coffee is always correct and awesome tasting.  I use the drive thru window more than I go in. I love how friendly they are and when my pups are in the car. They always offer a treat for them also!!

data.title: We chose our favorite hot and cold drinks and relaxed with our feet up!
data.text: We were pleased with the menu, which had a large variety of hot and cold drinks, plus several food items, either made from scratch or in the display case.  My husband had a Frappuccino and I chose a spicy hot Chai tea. The big, comfy couch and worn coffee table next to it allowed us to totally unwind after a long, stressful day.

data.title: Better than Dunkin!
data.text: Love this place! My husband and I will have it occasionally, which is a shame because we should have it more. Their chocolate chip muffins are delicious!! Their coffee selection is very broad with what seems to be a million different flavored you can add it. My favorite is the peppermint (tastes almost like Starbucks peppermint!). Definitely worth the little extra money to have something taste as good as this!

data.title: Love these guys!
data.text: I already loved Port City Java, being a Wilmington girl so I was excited when one was built right down the street from my office in Jacksonville. The crew working here is super nice and their lattes are always on point. I stop almost everyday and they already know what I want and how I want it. The kitchen is always clean....way cleaner than the Starbuck's kitchen on Western Blvd and the coffee is so much better. PCJ's version of Salted Caramel Latte is my favorite!

data.title: Starbucks copycat
data.text: I got the impression that this chain is trying to mimmick Starbucks.  The coffee is very good; didn't try the food but the selection of coffee and food seems a bit more extensive then Starbucks.  It's priced about the same. On our first visit, we received our drinks quickly since we were the only ones there.  On our second visit, it was a bit busier so we had to wait a very long time...it appeared that they were servicing the drive through customers before us.  😕

data.title: Not just coffee
data.text:
Not only does this coffe shop have GREAT coffee (you won't hear me use that word much when referring to commercial coffee), but it is staffed by some of the most friendly people you will probably meet in the city. I have had nothing but great service and delicious selections. Some of my favorites are: Black Mountain coffee (try it black), Mango Mango smoothies, and the bacon egg and cheese on a multi-grain croissant. The ambiance is relaxing and inviting and the location is convenient.

Try it out!
